relation: The campus is guarded with security 24/7. Students are safe.

Franciscan is your home-away from home. At Franciscan you are able to be apart of Chapel Ministries, Faith Households, Works of Mercies, Missions of Peace, Evangelization, Liturgical Committee, Student life, Student Government and more. Organizations range from learning more about your interest to concerts and campus events. Many groups are involved in local community while others help their fellow students. At Franciscan you find groups that will help you and challenge you to become a better, more well-rounded person.

U.S. News & World ReportÃ¢Â?Â?s 2008 Guide to AmericaÃ¢Â?Â?s Best Colleges named Franciscan to the elite Ã¢Â?Â?Top TierÃ¢Â?Â? of Midwest universities in its category for the seventh year in a row. And in 2007, The Newman Guide to Choosing a Catholic College cited Franciscan University as one of 21 recommended institutions.

There are many activities that students can get involved in for fun. Intramural sports are a great way to have fun and stay in shape. There are many clubs and households that students participate in. College isn't all about studying and Franciscan knows that. Throughout the year there are many events for students to get involved and have fun.

Franciscan dining services range from full-service cafeteria to coffee shops and fast food-style restaurants. There are a couple different plans to choose from that are best for you. Franciscan also offers meal exchanges that allow you to use a meal exchange at the retail locations on campus. You are also given points that allow you to buy from these retail locations. Franciscans cafeteria provides a grill, salad bar, their main dish and other great choices to choose from. There are also dietary needs available.

Residence life seeks to serve you. There are many different Halls throughout Franciscan with different communities in each. Franciscan allows you to be involved in a unique, energetic Catholic community unlike any other. Students are challenged and supported to live out their faith as they progressively mature. These communities help you find your vocation in a comfortable and safe dynamic that supports you academically and spiritually. Franciscan is build up on a Christ centered community.

This school doesn't use the slogan academically challenging for nothing. High academic standards will show in students performances and accomplishments. Students strive for higher education and are equipped with a faculty that challenges and strengthens them.

If your looking for a school that will help you grow spiritually this is the place to go. There are over 40 undergraduate programs and over 5 graduate programs. This school offers a life changing study abroad program in Austria. The student life is filled with many on campus activities including households, NCAA Division III sports and intramurals. You are also welcome to participate in many of the on campus ministries.

Franciscan University of Steubenville Ohio is an academically excellent school that is passionately catholic. It is a great place to grow spiritually, emotionally, physically and socially. It offers a great Catholic culture, with the best faith filled faculty in over 30 majors.

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Since we all share the same morals, values, and faith, you make friends so easily! I know that I've made friendships that will last a lifetime. Bang for the buck It's a bit expensive, but definately worth every penny. Am enjoying being here There is Mass 3 times a day, perpetual adoration, a chapel in every dorm building, praise and worship once a week, confession is offered almost every day, and so much more!! The spirituality here is just amazing and the people are so friendly! You feel at home right away! Am learning a lot The teachers here are amazing. They really know what they're talking about and you learn so much in each class.
